long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of web ads?
Asteroid is a lightweight, no UI extension that helps block all web ads that take unnecessary space on your screen.

FEATURES
> Simple, it blocks all ads that usually show up on webpages.
> No UI, Easy to use, just 'Add to Chrome'.

UPCOMING FEATURES
> Youtube ad blocking

HOW TO USE ASTEROID
> Just add the extension to your Chrome browser and watch the magic happen.

FEEDBACK AND BUG REPORTS
If you're having issues or found a bug, please don't post the bug report here, contact us directly so we can fix it: pratyushk.dev@gmail.com

Enjoying Asteroid?  Please rate us!
If you're not fully satisfied, please contact us at pratyushk.dev@gmail.com and we'll make sure to help :)
